paper_abstract: By using the critical point theory, we establish some existence criteria to guarantee the second-order discrete p(n)-Laplacian systems Delta(vertical bar Delta u(n - 1)vertical bar(p(n)) (2)u(n) - a(n) vertical bar u(n)vertical bar(p(n)-2)u(n)+del W(n, u(n)) = 0 have at least one or infinitely many homoclinic orbits, where n is an element of Z, u is an element of R-N, p : Z -> R+ and p(n) > 1, a : Z -> R and W : Z x R-N -> R are not periodic in n. (C) 2011 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Existence of homoclinic solutions for p(n)-Laplacian Hamiltonian systems on Orlicz sequence spaces
